translations: v．杜撰，虚构：在回忆或叙述时，无意识地编造或曲解事实。
· The patient confabulates when asked about his childhood.
当被问及童年时，病人开始杜撰。

sentences.sentence: Zannino's group studied patient M. L. - a 55-year-old woman who frequently confabulates following an aneurysm in the front of her brain.
sentences.translation: 赞尼诺的团队研究了病人M.L。，一名55岁的妇女，由于大脑前部的动脉瘤导致经常“虚谈”。
